ANU.biography: Matthew Kerby is a senior lecturer in the School of Politics and International Relations at the Australian National University where he researches and teaches courses on political elites and methods.
project: I am currently working on a number of research projects. I encourage prospective students to contact me if they are interested in researching related topics at the HDR and honours levels.
